trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Augusta
There was one other sighting in Augusta on or around October 5th 2008
Summary: possible morphing object, or perspective opticle illusion?
divs: Sighting Detailsmy daughter and i were observing the night sky. a bright light caught my periphial vision. i turned to the north, and observed a star like object travelling faster than a jet or satalite in an easterly direction, and made no sound. it shone brighter than jupiter, which planet we were primarly observing that evening. as it was directly overhead, it began to shrink, making me think it was going up in a mighty hurry. as it was shrinking, it turned red, finally disapearing in the night sky.
